headline.main: The Avant-Groove: We're All in It

results.snippet: IN increasing numbers and with increasing success, modern composers are discovering how to make the artistic quantum leap of our time: from the academic avant-garde to what may be called, for want of a more precise term, the event-groove.

results.abstract: Johnson stresses his desire to leave legacy of better relations with USSR after his term of office, message to Sen transmitting treaty on rescue and recovery of astronauts involved in crash-landings on foreign soil; confident of detente soon; calls treaty important step in series of accords; holds US-USSR cooperation vital to world peacemaking moves; some observers believe Johnson would like to meet with USSR leaders before he leaves office; Under Sec Katzenbach comments on Johnson efforts for detente

results.snippet: WASHINGTON, July 15 -President Johnson emphasized today his desire to leave a legacy of better relations with the Soviet Union after his term of office. He said he believed that the United States could soon advance toward detente with the Soviet...
results.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 15 -President Johnson emphasized today his desire to leave a legacy of better relations with the Soviet Union after his term of office. He said he believed that the United States could soon advance toward detente with the Soviet Union and toward an agreement to limit missile forces.

headline.main: U.S. PUTS GUN DEATHS AT TWO EVERY HOUR

results.snippet: WASHINGTON, July 18 (UPI) -- Americans are dying from gunfire in this country at the rate of one every half-hour, the Justice Department said today.
results.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 18 (UPI) -- Americans are dying from gunfire in this country at the rate of one every half-hour, the Justice Department said today.
